page.title: 07CHILDRENS FARM/LILFORD PARK
page.content:
This place is one of the most enjoyable places for the younger generation to visit. With all the coaches from the city and the urban areas the children can have the chance to get to know all the different animals of the British countryside.The farm has a variety of animals including shaggy Highland cattle, wallabies, Shetland ponies, pygmy goats, pigs, sheep and ducks. June is the best time to visit the children's farm because of the new born animals.
ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND/LILFORD PARK.
The tree house is a must for the younger generation and can also provide a period of relaxation for the parents...
